mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_HIDE = 'N'
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, NOTICE_COUNT, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "NOTICE_DATE" FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_HIDE = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT NOTICE_NO, MEMBER_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, NOTICE_COUNT, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "NOTICE_DATE", NOTICE_IMG, NOTICE_HIDE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_HIDE = 'N' AND NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} - 1 UNION ALL SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} + 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_HIDE = 'N'
AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%'

AND (NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%' OR NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%')
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${query}%'
